comments:
An error occurs when trying to import a Microsoft Windows Application Log.

-------------------------

IWAT0027E Error importing the specified log file.
  IWAT0412E Errors occurred parsing the log file null.
  java.lang.Exception: IWAT0239E Converter command failed: java.io.IOException:
CreateProcess:
E:\pdtools\hyades30_IES\eclipse\workspace\org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config\.\Windows\application\eventlogreader.exe
application C:\DOCUME~1\CHNG1M~1.818\LOCALS~1\Temp\WindowsLogParser41219.tmp error=2
java.lang.Exception: IWAT0239E Converter command failed: java.io.IOException:
CreateProcess:
E:\pdtools\hyades30_IES\eclipse\workspace\org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config\.\Windows\application\eventlogreader.exe
application C:\DOCUME~1\CHNG1M~1.818\LOCALS~1\Temp\WindowsLogParser41219.tmp error=2

-------------------------

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LogParserException: IWAT0412E Errors occurred
parsing the log file null.
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.logging.adapter.config.StaticParserWrapper.parse(StaticParserWrapper.java:123)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.LocalLogParserLoader.startParsing(LocalLogParserLoader.java:87)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.runOnLocalHost(ImportLogWizard.java:1040)
	at
org.eclipse.hyades.log.ui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$LocalLogImportJob.run(ImportLogWizard.java:1028)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

Malcom, it appears you are importing using a run-time workbench backed by 
org.eclpise.hyades.logging.adapter.config plugin in your workspace.  The 
converter program Windows\application\eventlogreader.exe is not in CVS.  Only 
the native source code is in CVS and the executable is built during the build.  
To work around this, copy the EventLogReader.exe executable from a 3.3 driver 
into the plugin in your workspace.

Please close this bugzilla if the above is your scenario.  If not, please 
provide your scenario and assign it to me.  Thanks.
Dave, thanks for the info.  I found the converter exe in the built driver.

traces.message: IWAT0412E Errors occurred parsing the log file null.
